requirements.summary: Create media gallery for photos and certificates with upload capability
acceptanceCriteria: Users can upload photos through the interface
Users can upload certificates through the interface
Uploaded photos and certificates are displayed in a gallery format
Each item can be viewed in full size

file_operations.description: Create MediaGallery component with tabbed interface for Photos and Certificates. Use the blob-storage component's ExternalBlob class for file uploads and display. Include upload buttons for each tab that accept file inputs. For photos, call backend.addPhoto() with PhotoData containing id, description, and ExternalBlob. For certificates, call backend.addCertificate() with CertificateData containing id, title, and ExternalBlob. Display uploaded items in a responsive grid layout using getDirectURL() for image/file display. Implement full-size modal view for each item. Use ExternalBlob.fromBytes() to create blobs from file inputs and withUploadProgress() to show upload progress. Verify the blob-storage component's usage instructions before implementing.

Create custom hook for managing media upload state, progress tracking, and backend integration. Handle file selection, validation, upload progress callbacks, and backend method calls (addPhoto, addCertificate). Return upload handlers, progress state, and error handling.

Import and render the MediaGallery component in the Home page layout. Include the generated certificate-bg.dim_800x600.png from frontend/public/assets/generated/certificate-bg.dim_800x600.png as a background or decorative element in the certificates section.
